# Equivalent curl commands for webserver tests
# Generated by Web Server Error Testing Script
# Target server: http://localhost:8080
# Generated at: 2025-08-25 11:45:24


# === Error 400 (Bad Request) ===
# Test: Error 400 (Bad Request)
curl -X GET "http://localhost:8080/?invalid="


# === Error 403 (Forbidden) ===
# Test: Error 403 (Forbidden)
curl -X GET "http://localhost:8080/forbidden"


# === Error 404 (Not Found) ===
# Test: Error 404 (Not Found)
curl -X GET "http://localhost:8080/nonexistent"


# === Error 405 (Method Not Allowed) ===
# Test: Error 405 (Method Not Allowed)
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/"


# === Error 414 (URI Too Long) ===
# Test: Error 414 (URI Too Long)
curl -X GET "http://localhost:"


# === Global body size limit ===
# Test: Global body size limit
curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: text/plain" -d "[1MB+1 data]" "http://localhost:8080/"  # Should trigger 413
# Note: Should trigger 413


# === CGI body size limit ===
# Test: CGI body size limit
curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: text/plain" -d "[100KB+1 data]" "http://localhost:8080/cgi-bin/test"  # Should trigger 413
# Note: Should trigger 413


# === Basic chunked request ===
# Test: Basic chunked request
curl -X POST -H "Transfer-Encoding: chunked" -d "This is a test of chunked encoding" "http://localhost:8080/cgi-bin/test"  # Basic chunked transfer
# Note: Basic chunked transfer


# === Multiple small chunks ===
# Test: Multiple small chunks
curl -X POST -H "Transfer-Encoding: chunked" -d "Hello World from chunks!" "http://localhost:8080/cgi-bin/test"  # Multiple small chunks
# Note: Multiple small chunks


# === Large chunks under limit ===
# Test: Large chunks under limit
curl -X POST -H "Transfer-Encoding: chunked" -d "[50KB data]" "http://localhost:8080/cgi-bin/test"  # Large chunk under 100KB limit
# Note: Large chunk under 100KB limit


# === Chunked exceeding CGI limit ===
# Test: Chunked exceeding CGI limit
curl -X POST -H "Transfer-Encoding: chunked" -d "[101KB chunked data]" "http://localhost:8080/cgi-bin/test"  # Should trigger 413 - exceeds 100KB CGI limit
# Note: Should trigger 413 - exceeds 100KB CGI limit


# === Chunked exceeding global limit ===
# Test: Chunked exceeding global limit
curl -X POST -H "Transfer-Encoding: chunked" -d "[1.1MB chunked data]" "http://localhost:8080/"  # Should trigger 413 - exceeds 1MB global limit
# Note: Should trigger 413 - exceeds 1MB global limit


# === Chunked with empty chunks ===
# Test: Chunked with empty chunks
curl -X POST -H "Transfer-Encoding: chunked" -d "HelloWorld" "http://localhost:8080/cgi-bin/test"  # Contains empty chunks
# Note: Contains empty chunks


# === Binary chunked data ===
# Test: Binary chunked data
curl -X POST -H "Transfer-Encoding: chunked" -H "Content-Type: application/octet-stream" -d "[binary data]" "http://localhost:8080/cgi-bin/test"  # Binary chunks
# Note: Binary chunks


# === Chunked JSON data ===
# Test: Chunked JSON data
curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Transfer-Encoding: chunked" -d "{"message": "test", "chunked": true}" "http://localhost:8080/cgi-bin/test"  # JSON with chunked encoding
# Note: JSON with chunked encoding


# === Many small chunks stress test ===
# Test: Many small chunks stress test
curl -X POST -H "Transfer-Encoding: chunked" -d "[100 small chunks]" "http://localhost:8080/cgi-bin/test"  # Stress test with many chunks
# Note: Stress test with many chunks


# === Chunked with extra headers ===
# Test: Chunked with extra headers
curl -X POST -H "Transfer-Encoding: chunked" -H "X-Custom-Header: test-value" -H "User-Agent: WebServTester/1.0" -H "Accept: text/plain" -d "Test with extra headers" "http://localhost:8080/cgi-bin/test"  # Chunked request with additional headers
# Note: Chunked request with additional headers
